title: Day 928
content:
# Day 928

Today, I'd like to outline some of my goals and reflect on my progress. I'm incredibly grateful for everything in my life, but sometimes it feels like there's not enough time to balance all that I want to accomplish. Therefore, I'll start by highlighting the achievements I'm proud of:

- **Writing Every Day:** I can't believe I'm approaching 1,000 consecutive days.

- **Reading a Chapter Daily This Year:** It really starts to add up.

- **Enhancing My Coding Skills:** Continuing with Replit's 100 Days of Code has been rewarding.

Looking ahead, here are some objectives I'd like to achieve in the next 30 days:

- **Build a Website for binmucker.com**

- **Purchase a 3D Printer** (Completed! ðŸŽ‰ )

- **Deploy the Website**

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*qArK5s5F_U43Lkss7-NZCg.png)

I am also going to aim to cultivate a more measured approach to life. The constant stimulation from social media can leave one feeling drained and irritable. Recognizing that anger may shorten one's lifespan, I'll pause and breathe whenever I feel its grip. While emotions have their place, acting on them impulsively rarely serves us well. Don't let your emotions throw you into a blender. That's how you end up with life's worst smoothie.

10/5/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
